name: Mini-Planets! For the 2020 GMTK Game Jam!
name_original: Mini-Planets! For the 2020 GMTK Game Jam!
description:
Press Space to jump, and to switch directions mid-air!

It is highly recommended to play the downloaded version of the game, as it runs and plays significantly better than the WebGL version.

Audio used from: Kenney Game Assets
